taskbody.prereq: Embedded server must be already created through a template (i.e., server-pms or server-cdm) and available in the Server view pane.

step.cmd: In the Server view pane, right-click the line Embedded Server ([server name]) on [port number] and choose Open Server Preferences...
step.stepresult: The preferences are opened directly on the Design Studio Servers Embedded settings.

step.cmd: Use the Browse button to choose the Triple'A Plus installation directory of your machine.
If you want to watch the deployment process from the Console view pane (recommended), check Log all deployed files . (See section .)

In the Open Login Preferences, enter the list of log file names, separated by a period, to have these logs in the Console view pane. To see all available log files in Triple'A Plus, go to the logs directory of your Embedded server project.
step.info: Log(s) entries are redirected to the Console view pane, tracing the application deployment and runtime. You can switch from one deployment console to log(s) from the Console view pane.

step.cmd: To empty the Console view pane when starting the Embedded server, check Clear logs at startup .
